quote: Thinking about such things soothed the creature as it dug at the base of a tall oak tree, deep into the ground, covering itself with dirt and leaves and moss; hiding, healing, waiting.
quote_letters: THINKING ABOUT SUCH THINGS SOOTHED THE CREATURE AS IT DUG AT THE BASE OF A TALL OAK TREE DEEP INTO THE GROUND COVERING ITSELF WITH DIRT AND LEAVES AND MOSS HIDING HEALING WAITING
